frontmatter.description: In this week's episode, we dive into the fascinating world of OpenAI's Sora video generation software.

frontmatter.description: This week, we explore the exciting world of superconductivity and are late to the party discussing LK-99.
frontmatter.title: LK-99, Super Conductivity, and the future!

frontmatter.description: In this episode, we take a deep dive into the world of animation by exploring Disney's ground breaking renderer, Hyperion.

frontmatter.description: In this episode we embark on a unique journey to the fictional world of Middle-Earth and the very non-fictional world of climate models.
